source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_SEQ_00<tab>Something is keeping Mogga from crossing this bridge.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_SEQ_00<tab>白亜の宮殿のモグッカは、少し怯えているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_SEQ_01<tab>Mogga has been tasked with patrolling Zenith for any signs of dragons serving the evil Nidhogg, and it seems she may have found some across the bridge she is cowering in front of. However, the poor moogle is too frightened to check herself, and bids you go in her stead. Cross the bridge and be on the lookout for any dragons that may be lurking about.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_SEQ_01<tab>宮殿内が制圧されたことを、「モグモグ護衛団」のモグッカに伝えた。モグッカは、冒険者に見回りを代わってほしいようだ。ドラヴァニア雲海の白亜の宮殿を見回り、敵が現れたら討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_SEQ_02<tab>You have rid this part of Zenith of the dragon threat...for now. Report to Mogga and tell her the hardest part of her patrol is finished.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_SEQ_02<tab>現れた敵を討伐した。白亜の宮殿の「モグッカ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_SEQ_03<tab>Relieved that she will no longer have to deal with the wrath of dragons, Mogga returns to her patrol duty and asks you to warn Mogok to be extra alert on his patrol.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_SEQ_03<tab>モグッカは引き続き、宮殿内の見回りを続けるようだ。モグッカは、護衛団の仲間であるモグオクのことが気がかりなようだ。白亜の宮殿付近で「モグオク」を見かけたら、注意するよう伝えてあげよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_TODO_00<tab>Search for dragons in the specified areas.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_TODO_00<tab>白亜の宮殿を見回り、敵が現れたら討伐

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_000<tab>Oh! Adventurer, I thought you were a dragon, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_000……くぽっ！
なんだ冒険者か、びっくりしたくぽ～。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_001<tab>What!? Dragons have already been spotted prowling Zenith? We can't just let them run amok in our sacred palaces!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_001くぽぽっ！？
もう宮殿の内部に、邪竜様の眷属が侵入しているくぽ？
そ、それは大変くぽ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_002<tab>In fact, I think I can hear their impudent growls from here. But...dragons are so monstrous, and their claws are so sharp...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_002じ、じゃあ、この先にも、もしかして……くぽ？
なんだか気味が悪くなってきたくぽ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_003<tab>Just imagining the dragons fills me with dread...but <var 1A 02 /var>you're<var 1A 01 /var> brave enough! Do you suppose maybe you could cross this bridge and scare away any dragons you find, kupo?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_003口に出して言ってみたら、ちょっと怖くなってきたくぽ……。
この先の様子、ちょっと見てきてくれないくぽ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_010<tab>I can't imagine there're very many of them... Just cross the bridge and check, will you?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_010<tab>この先の様子、ちょっと見てきてくれないくぽ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_020<tab>There...there were <var 1A 02 /var>how<var 1A 01 /var> many dragons across the bridge? Thank heavens for you, adventurer, I would've tired out after slaying just one, kupo.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_020ほ、ほんとうに邪竜様の眷属がいたくぽ！？
くぽぽ、モグの予想は的中くぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_021<tab>Well, I shall return to my patrol... Mayhap I should keep a wide berth from <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> area...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_021モグだったら、やられてたくぽ……ありがとうくぽ！
じゃあ、モグは気をつけながら見回りをしてくるくぽ～。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_022<tab>Ah, while you're here, I would ask one more favor from you. Mogok is also patrolling the area nearby. Pray tell him to be <var 1A 02 /var>extra<var 1A 01 /var> alert on his patrol─we wouldn't want him to be dragon food, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ531_01866_MOGGA_000_022そうだ、護衛団のモグオクも、近くにいるはずくぽ。
「モグオク」を見かけたら、注意するよう伝えてほしいくぽ！
